sys_ux_client_script.name: Launch Special Handling Notes

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_3a32625c15220210560acbe885bdd3c1
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">fa32625cdb2202101eeab0806aea03c1</macroponent><name>Launch Special Handling Notes</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    helpers,
    event,
    imports
}) {
   const {
    snHttp,
    modal,
    screen
} = helpers;

    var SHNOutput = api.data.get_special_handling_notes.output.data.GlideSHN_Query;
    var showModal = SHNOutput && SHNOutput.totalMsg > 0;
    var gFormData = api.data.gform.nowRecordFormBlob;

    if (api.state.specialHandlingNotesDisplayed)    return;

    if (showModal && gFormData && api.context.props.screen.isActive) {
        api.emit('RECORD#OPEN_MODAL', {
            "route": "shn",
            "fields": {
                "confs": SHNOutput,
                "table": gFormData.table,
                "sysId": gFormData.sysId
            }
        });
        api.setState("specialHandlingNotesDisplayed", true);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 17:32:16</sys_created_on><sys_id>3a32625c15220210560acbe885bdd3c1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Launch Special Handling Notes</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_3a32625c15220210560acbe885bdd3c1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 17:32:16</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
